credit_line: Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund
title: Frame for a papal inscription
provenance: Ex collection: Piancastelli and Mrs. Edward D. Brandegee.
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash
description: Vertical rectangle. A tablet, the lower edge of which is curved upwards in the center, is supported by a lion's mask. Seemingly in front of the crossed papal keys, and branches hanging from them towards the mask. On top the tiara. Usual background.
name: Drawing
